name: Pencil Puzzle - Kakuro
description:
This is Pencil Puzzle app.
This puzzle is commonly known as Kakuro.
Puzzle board is generated automatically.

◇ Features ◇
- All Free
- Automatically board random generation
- Long-term playing
- Auto save
- Challenge mode with 64 stages
- Zooming game board by pinch-in, pinch-out
- Easy playing large game board
- Line highlighted, on, off
- Support device orientations
